column2: There is an ongoing genocide in your nation. You may put it to an end.
Everyone not of the faith in this province is being put to the sword.
Everyone in this province is being put to the sword.
This province is being plundered and the population slaughtered.
You have issued orders to slaughter the people of an enemy.
Who are allowed to hold government positions in the Realm.
Jobs are only held by allowed Races.
Commit genocide and destroy a foreign religion in your realm.
Commit genocide and destroy a foreign race in your realm.
You are at war and can slaughter the location population and steal it from your enemies.
You have called up a Religious Purge, now which religion do you wish to remove from your realm?
You have called up a Racial Genocide, now which peoples do you wish to remove from your realm?
The Crown has called a general slaughter against a people and demands you execute any of thepeoples in your Realm.
This is ridiculous! I'll send them away.
You have completed a Religious Purge in a province in your realm, slaughtering a great many of your people.
You have completed a Racial Genocide in a province in your realm, slaughtering a great many of your people.
You have an ongoing genocide in your realm, and you can stop it.
This is horrific, end it immediately!
You have an ongoing genocide of your people in your realm, and you can stop it.
This is horrific, end it immediately!
You have an ongoing genocide in your realm, and you can stop it.
This is horrific, end it immediately!
You Racial Supremacism active in your realm with characters in council in the realm.
You have called up a Genocide of an enemy province, slaughtering the locals and stealing it to your realm. Are you sure?
You have genocided an enemy province and refilled it with your own people, absorbing it into your own realm.
